description:
Information about this model
            Model name: MusicNet-HCFP-Frame-MultiInst
            Input feature type: HCFP
            Input channels: [1, 3]
            Timesteps: 128
            Label type: multi_instrument_frame
            Thresholds:
                Instrument: 1.1
                Frame: 0.5
                Onset: 6
                Duration: 0
            Training settings:
                Previously trained on MusicNet
                Maximum epochs: 20
                Steps per epoch: 3000
                Training batch size: 8
                Validation batch size: 8
                Loss function type: focal
                Early stopping: 6
